dict.string:
Little hip hop symphony. The more and the longer you shake the more you get. Shake left/right for scratching, touch the screen to trigger samples. More controls to discover. Audio samples from freesound.org and soundsnap.com. The creative commons attributions are listed below:
splintered brain 3.wav (http://www.freesound.org/samplesViewSingle.php?id=31648)
Fires of frustration.wav (http://www.freesound.org/samplesViewSingle.php?id=33566)
Hiroshima.wav (http://www.freesound.org/samplesViewSingle.php?id=31644)
ExcessiveExposure.wav (http://www.freesound.org/samplesViewSingle.php?id=33711)
G.W.Bush - An empire of oppression.wav (http://www.freesound.org/samplesViewSingle.php?id=15376)
